name: Community Works Youth Theater Ensemble
description: Youth Theatre Programs are for high school students in San Francisco who have an incarcerated parent. Using theater as our medium, we help our students give voice to their difficult experiences and process the trauma that comes with having an incarcerated parent. There is a CW theater Arts Elective, which is a for-credit elective course which culminates in an original play developed by the students. There is also a CW Youth Theater Ensemble (CWYTE), which provides the same opportunities in a mor

howToGetIt: -Submit an inquiry at info@communityworkswest.org or call (510) 268-8116 to learn more about the programs offered. -If you'd like for Community Works West to follow up with you directly, visit https://communityworkswest.org/contact/ and complete the form to leave your information.
